text: Ni akutiji soni: “Yaili mu ndumbo sya ayi ilangoyi iwele yaachalume wetupe basi, soni iwele haraam kwa achakongwe wetu.” Nambo naga kupagwa chili chachiwe, basi niakuwa wakamusyangana (kulya) chalakwecho (wanaose achalume ni achakongwe). Tachalipila (pakwapa ilagasyo) ligongo lya yakusimba yao (yaunami), chisimu Jwalakwe ni Jwalunda lwakusokoka, Jwakumanyilila nnope
